MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 area of Newcastleton, affecting properties in North Hermitage Street and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm due to repairs required to our equipment near Pathhead substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:25am on Saturday, 20 March 2021
